query: SELECT id, title, category, description FROM prompts ORDER BY category, title LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Mhpd8nk54dx6w3.root --database e9RJaE3TPmF4zsnh5FSQoP --execute SELECT id, title, category, description FROM prompts ORDER BY category, title LIMIT 20;
